lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: "We are like dwarfs sitting on the shoulders of giants. We see more, and things that are more distant, than they did, not because our sight is superior or because we are taller than they, but because they raise us up, and by their great stature add to ours." -Sir Isaac Newton

lender.name: JULIAN

lender.name: Judy Belanger
lender.loan_because: I loan because their is always someone else who is worse of than me. People have helped me out and so the circle should go around. Circle of families
lender.occupational_info: I am 62 and laid off, Unemployment is sending me to school to work in the medical field. I am very appreciative of this. I will soon retire and work partime.

lender.name: Michael & Amanda
lender.loan_because: we want for others to have a chance to improve their lives, care for their family's , and better the communities they live in.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I am blessed in many ways; helping those less fortunate than I, giving back, is important to me.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit agency for at-risk youth of Chicago: Mercy Home for Boys & Girls. It is a 121-year old institution that has served over 20,000 youth who come to escape poor living situations. Mercy Home provides all of life's necessities to the youth, along with medical treatment, therapy, education and, most importantly, hope. It is 99.7% privately funded.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I want to share the blessings which have been bestowed onto me.

lender.loan_because: We all need a partner

lender.name: David

lender.name: charlie
lender.occupational_info: i make video games..

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I believe that each country and region in the world has unique challenges and that the people living in each place knows what they need individually and collectively to begin to make a difference in people's lives. I trust those people across the world that if given the opportunity, they will know what their family and neighbors need. I believe it is a way to bring about lasting change... a change that is not a quick fix, but empowering one life at a time. I value humanity, and therefore I value their needs... not what I deem their needs to be, but to listen and to act on their behalf.

lender.name: Chase
lender.loan_because: I hope to make someone's life better

lender.name: Kristina
lender.occupational_info: I am an ESOL (English for Speakers of Other Languages)/Migrant Specialist for a public school district in Rogers, Arkansas.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: Someone once helped me.
lender.occupational_info: I record all sorts of music, mostly classical these days...

lender.name: Stefanie S
lender.loan_because: everybody should.

lender.name: Troy
lender.loan_because: I want to be the person that help make a difference, and through this example i hope others will be inspired to loan as well.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell land to build homes and businesses. Remember what you have and where you live does not define you. You have what it takes to succeed because you came from God and as his child you have the right and talent to create.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: a little can go a long way.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I love people and want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Changing the lives of people with the power of the gospel.

lender.loan_because: people need to first have boots before they can pull themselves up with their bootstraps.
lender.occupational_info: I help insure people are treated fairly in their workplace.

lender.name: Ellia
lender.loan_because: It's something I am able to do with a limited budget that makes a big impact. Then after the money I have lent has made this impact, it comes back to me and I can lend it to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a music publisher dealing with contracts and copyright issues, and I also have a band in which I sing and play ukulele.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Small business is the backbone of every functioning economy, and the more of them that are funded, supported and assisted the better off we will all be.
lender.occupational_info: I am a lawyer in a criminal, property and small business practice.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I believe in grassroots movements and I believe in helping each other.
lender.occupational_info: I teach private lessons to people who want to improve how they function.

lender.name: Earnest
lender.loan_because: I believe in people. I believe that most people, when given a chance to succeed, will surpass all expectations. It is a Mitzvah - Tikkun Olam!

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I feel it is important to empower women across the world through agricultural opportunities. Give a woman a cow and you will create an economy that respects her. Eventually, that economy will encourage a society that respects women as well.

lender.name: Kori
lender.loan_because: hard-working people deserve a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Stanley Black & Decker. I provide communication and marketing materials to our sales team to help sell hand and power tools.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: many have helped me in life and I want to offer help to others, however small.
lender.occupational_info: I write stories.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I like helping people. I loan through Kiva because I like their approach toward alleviating poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I make signs and other items for businesses to advertise with. I also make art for people to hang in their homes.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I think Kiva is a great way of providing funding for those in need, that is sustainable and doesn't rely on donations. I feel good that part of my financial portfolio is working to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Manager in a technology department of a large finance company.

lender.name: Gracie
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who are working hard to improve the lives of their families and communities.

lender.occupational_info: Helping people achieve their business objectives.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: it's an easy way to help others.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: everybody deserves a chance to achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Kirby Smith
lender.loan_because: I am interested in better understanding the processes of micro-lending, as well as its consequences on the lender, borrower, and borrower's immediate social network . As a method of alleviating poverty microfinance possesses great potential--may it be realized!
lender.occupational_info: I work as a finance analyst for Google's strategic partnerships group, examining companies acquiring and servicing small to mid-sized business (SMB) advertisers around the world.

lender.name: Dru
lender.loan_because: The oppurtunity to help people that truely deserve it presented itself to me. I took advantage of the situation.
lender.occupational_info: My name is Andrew. I am 23 years old. I find myself trying to enjoy life to the fullest. I have an incredibly bright future, and I will continue to do the things necessary for me to have a successful life. I am a very giving person who can find enjoyment in any situation, and so I am not hard to please. I realized at a young age that life is full of choices, and that you have to make the right choices everyday of your life to reach your fullest potential.

lender.name: JoAnn
lender.loan_because: We all need a little hand up sometimes.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: Governments cannot be relied upon to help their people, only other people can.

lender.loan_because: to develop education tools for fundraising my organization
lender.occupational_info: it is tools for teacher and children in developing their knowledge. we teach by CD media

lender.loan_because: I loan money because my profession has allowed me a real life view in to the lives of those outside of the markets, where so many have already taken advantage of people, and then forgotten them.
lender.occupational_info: Protecting My brothers, and doing my best to ensure that those who are leaders in this world, are there to protect, not harm.

lender.name: Brett
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that makes medical devices.

lender.name: Maurog
lender.loan_because: I'm a Laissez-Faire Capitalist, and I believe throwing money on things makes them grow. Regular charity is bad, since throwing money on poor people just makes more poor people. But loaning money to small businesses makes small businesses stronger, makes the economy stronger, thus helping everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I make computer programs that work. In return, they pay me enough money to play video games and stay on the internet all day.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: I am lucky...and some people aren't quite as lucky as I am. We can't choose what life we are born into. It's a small way to make a difference to someone else's luck.

lender.name: Palit Hanafi Lubis
lender.loan_because: I placed college students need a computer to support the lecture. They have limited means to buy computers with payment in cash. For the initial phase of 25 people I want to facilitate students to achieve credit computers would be repayable over 12 months.

lender.occupational_info: I participate to write sofwares to analyze computers.

lender.occupational_info: I teach at a university in Virginia educating men and women who will practice as registered nurses in the United States.

lender.name: Belinda
lender.loan_because: "Every man is a consumer, and ought to be a producer. He fails to make his place good in the world unless he not only pays his debt but also adds something to the common wealth." --Ralph Waldo Emerson
lender.occupational_info: My job is to benchmark the reliability and performance of database management systems.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Ginger
lender.loan_because: I know the struggles of owning your own business.
lender.occupational_info: I sell items that will bring a smile to people's faces.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I believe that microloans are an excellent way to help someone better their situation.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a graduate student in chemistry researching organic solar cells.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: When I was growing up, we ran a small family business.
lender.occupational_info: Inspiring new ways of thinking about what to do.

lender.name: Sonia
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful things to do, and I like to help women and children
lender.occupational_info: I am one of the founders of the second wave of the women's movement in the US.

lender.name: Barbie & Bryant
lender.occupational_info: We are both college students. Bryant studies Entreprenuership/ Marketing and I am an Interior Design major.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: Karma. It's a better world when we help each other.
lender.occupational_info: Trying to help to make our world a better place. Taking small steps to make a difference.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I want to make a different!

lender.name: Martyn
lender.loan_because: if you never give, you can never expect to receive.
lender.occupational_info: Student, firstly, followed by web developer. I love life, but most of all love making life better for others. Inspired by Robin Hood! ;)

lender.name: Ramsey
lender.loan_because: This is just such a great idea.
lender.occupational_info: I am a doctor who takes care of children. I work in a small town in Massachusetts.

lender.name: Dr Omar
lender.loan_because: I loan because i want to help the small and big scale business to develop their ideas and generate it well
lender.occupational_info: Dubai International Finance Centre (DIFC) is the largest Finance Centre in the Middle East. With over 5 trillion private and corporate investment portfolios.

lender.name: Kris & Bill
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowerment. The less people working for multinational corporations the better. Power to the PEOPLE!

lender.loan_because: To help others

lender.name: COSME DE MELO
lender.loan_because: Eu acredito que todos devem ter pelo menos uma chance. Por menor que seja.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I care. I respect hard work and determination and understand the circumstances that applicants are working with.

lender.loan_because: we make a difference.

lender.name: Ms Marie
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance - these courageous individuals are just trying to make a difference, and succeeding!!! Pay it forward - what a novel idea!!!!!!!!!
lender.occupational_info: Presently, pleasantly, RETIRED!!! Life is better - if we only try to make it better for others!!

lender.name: Liesbeth
lender.loan_because: I deal with loans in my professional carreer, and think it is a good idea to support microfinancing as a private person.
lender.occupational_info: I am a manager with a bank and I am responsible for internet and call center teams that give out loans to people in Germany.

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: I want to support people in their efforts to make the world a better place for us all.
